title: Installation issue: icu4c with python3
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ . share/spack/setup-env.sh
$ spack install icu4c
```

### Error Message

```
==> Error: Exception occurred in writer daemon!
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/sftnight/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/tty/log.py", line 447, in _writer_daemon
    line = in_pipe.readline()
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.6/encodings/ascii.py", line 26, in decode
    return codecs.ascii_decode(input, self.errors)[0]
UnicodeDecodeError: 'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xe2 in position 220: ordinal not in range(128)
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status -13:
    'make' '-j8'
See build log for details:
  /tmp/sftnight/spack-stage/spack-stage-icu4c-65.1-55wm4t2wm3y7ibzmdsn5jwhgqhplfxna/spack-build-out.txt
```

### Information on your system

CentOS7, Python 3.6.8 (taken from the system) - command fails. Python 2.7.5 (also from the system) - command works fine.

Commenting lines 55-58 (i.e. not setting LC_ALL) fixes compilation with Python3 (and doesn't break compilation with Python2).
